short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension will create a Popup that will show the requested value without open the Network tab (if exist).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Have you ever needed to quickly read a value from the Headers Response? Well, instead of opening the network, refresh the page and actually search for your value among the multitude of values that will come to you, here is an extension that is just right for you!

Turn it on, enter the value you need et voila! The game is done!
